issue.title: Freevee Missed Ad Problem

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/detail/B00C17815Q/ref=atv_3p_fre_c_FCil6v_2_1?jic=36%7CCgtmcmVld2l0aGFkcxIMc3Vic2NyaXB0aW9u

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<![freevee ad](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/117128071/7b2cfc19-a856-4881-830e-e1a3ebfe523f)>

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Not a request to fix, it's purely for consideration by the development team. There is a random(occasional)  minor overlap in some sections where the ads have been skipped, it restarts at a start point before the ad is inserted so some of the content is replayed for 10-20 secs or so . In another situation, it is possible to review a potential fix if it isn't time-consuming,  as mentioned in the last comment, auto skip before the series episode has ended to the next episode does occur without giving the viewer the option to cancel.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151013#issuecomment-1552260326 - I cannot reproduce it.
Please try to add these rules:
```adblock
decrypt.day#$#body { overflow: visible !important; }
decrypt.day#$#body div.fc-ab-root:not(#style_important) { display: none !important; }
```
or
```adblock
@@||decrypt.day^$generichide
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151131#issue-1714276270 - I cannot reproduce it.
Please try to restart web browser.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151131#issuecomment-1552294189 - Not reproduced.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151131#issuecomment-1552519543 - It looks like that you have all filter lists enabled (or most of them), so it's probably caused by one of the third-party filter list.
So, please disable filter lists one by one and check which one causes this issue.

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end even with a Turkish IP.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.thelocal.ch/20221122/7-essential-apps-that-make-life-in-geneva-easier-for-foreign-residents](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thelocal.ch%2F20221122%2F7-essential-apps-that-make-life-in-geneva-easier-for-foreign-residents) ### Comment > I have confirmed that the problem occurs with the following three URLs. > > https://www.thelocal.ch/20221122/7-essential-apps-that-make-life-in-geneva-easier-for-foreign-residents > https://inews.co.uk/opinion/middle-class-drug-users-blame-increased-violence-leaders-2249354 > https://www.edp24.co.uk/news/23442456.kings-lynn-partner-murder-victim-will-never-forgive-killer/ > > The following rules already exist on these sites to block subscription pop-ups. > > ! tinypass.com / piano.io popup > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#html > body.tp-modal-open { overflow: auto !important; } > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#div[class="tp-modal"][style^="z-index: 3000"] { display: none !important; } > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#div[class="tp-modal"][style^="z-index: 3000"] ~ div.tp-backdrop { display: none !important; } > > However, the subscription popup is not blocked correctly on mobile. After waiting a few seconds the popup appears, and/or the scrolling is locked and the background color changes. > > I have confirmed that I can correctly block subscription popups by changing the rule as follows. > > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#html > body.tp-modal-open { overflow: auto !important; touch-action: unset !important; background: unset !important; } > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#div[class^="tp-modal"][style^="z-index: 3000"] { display: none !important; } > jiji.com,edp24.co.uk,technologyreview.com,inews.co.uk,nordbayern.de,thelocal.ch,morgenpost.de,waz.de,nrz.de,braunschweiger-zeitung.de,abendblatt.de,wolfsburger-nachrichten.de,wolfenbuetteler-zeitung.de,ynet.co.il#$#div[class^="tp-modal"][style^="z-index: 3000"] ~ div.tp-backdrop { display: none !important; } > > Please check. ### Screenshots

issue.title: onlaine-bank.ru
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

It's dns.adguard-dns.com server

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://onlaine-bank.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Is this site supposed to be blocked? Ublock with adguard filters doesn't block it, but `dig @dns.adguard-dns.com +tls onlaine-bank.ru` returns

> onlaine-bank.ru.        3600    IN      A       94.140.14.33

which points to `dns.adguard.com` and causes TLS error:

```
$ curl -v https://onlaine-bank.ru
*   Trying 94.140.14.33:443...
* Connected to onlaine-bank.ru (94.140.14.33) port 443 (#0)
* ALPN: offers h2,http/1.1
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS handshake, Client hello (1):
*  CAfile: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
*  CApath: none
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Server hello (2):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Encrypted Extensions (8):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Certificate (11):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, CERT verify (15):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Finished (20):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS change cipher, Change cipher spec (1):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS handshake, Finished (20):
* SSL connection using TLSv1.3 / TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
* ALPN: server did not agree on a protocol. Uses default.
* Server certificate:
*  subject: CN=dns.adguard.com
*  start date: Dec  2 00:00:00 2022 GMT
*  expire date: Dec  2 23:59:59 2023 GMT
*  subjectAltName does not match onlaine-bank.ru
* SSL: no alternative certificate subject name matches target host name 'onlaine-bank.ru'
* Closing connection 0
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Newsession Ticket (4):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS alert, close notify (256):
curl: (60) SSL: no alternative certificate subject name matches target host name 'onlaine-bank.ru'
More details here: https://curl.se/docs/sslcerts.html
```

Google and CLoudflare DNS servers without filters return different result and TLS works properly:
```
dig @1.1.1.1 +tls onlaine-bank.ru
```
>onlaine-bank.ru.        14400   IN      A       185.162.8.18


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: onlaine-bank.ru

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

It's dns.adguard-dns.com server

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://onlaine-bank.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Is this site supposed to be blocked? Ublock with adguard filters doesn't block it, but `dig @dns.adguard-dns.com +tls onlaine-bank.ru` returns

> onlaine-bank.ru.        3600    IN      A       94.140.14.33

which points to `dns.adguard.com` and causes TLS error:

```
$ curl -v https://onlaine-bank.ru
*   Trying 94.140.14.33:443...
* Connected to onlaine-bank.ru (94.140.14.33) port 443 (#0)
* ALPN: offers h2,http/1.1
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS handshake, Client hello (1):
*  CAfile: /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt
*  CApath: none
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Server hello (2):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Encrypted Extensions (8):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Certificate (11):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, CERT verify (15):
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Finished (20):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS change cipher, Change cipher spec (1):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS handshake, Finished (20):
* SSL connection using TLSv1.3 / TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256
* ALPN: server did not agree on a protocol. Uses default.
* Server certificate:
*  subject: CN=dns.adguard.com
*  start date: Dec  2 00:00:00 2022 GMT
*  expire date: Dec  2 23:59:59 2023 GMT
*  subjectAltName does not match onlaine-bank.ru
* SSL: no alternative certificate subject name matches target host name 'onlaine-bank.ru'
* Closing connection 0
* TLSv1.3 (IN), TLS handshake, Newsession Ticket (4):
* TLSv1.3 (OUT), TLS alert, close notify (256):
curl: (60) SSL: no alternative certificate subject name matches target host name 'onlaine-bank.ru'
More details here: https://curl.se/docs/sslcerts.html
```

Google and CLoudflare DNS servers without filters return different result and TLS works properly:
```
dig @1.1.1.1 +tls onlaine-bank.ru
```
>onlaine-bank.ru.        14400   IN      A       185.162.8.18


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: It was blocked because the domain name has features of a phishing website. We went ahead and unblocked it for you and other users. Please allow a couple of hours for the servers to update the databases.
